title: Paying someone to fix my lolreplay
body:
Can anyone help me with getting my lolreplay recording to work again? 

None of my recordings work at the moment but there is one that I would really love to view again, anyone got any tips on how to fix this? :(

Thanks!

replies.body: I have a pre-existing replay that I want to get to work again.

> [{quoted}](name=Klethal,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xGgjGerP,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-05-07T09:23:43.902+0000)
>
> Can anyone help me with getting my lolreplay recording to work again? 
> 
> None of my recordings work at the moment but there is one that I would really love to view again, anyone got any tips on how to fix this? :(
> 
> Thanks!

http://www.skinspotlights.com/p/skinspotlights-replays.html 
Use that. Works perfectly.

Its because the actual recorder doesn't work anymore, they aren't updating it enough to keep up with all of the patches on the server, it wont show or record unless its the exact same version as the game itself, you need to use a new recorder, _Baron Replays_ or You could sign up at http://loldb.gameguyz.com/analyze/pro/list/acctId/200869075/server/9/summonerId/2020184 and it will automatically record your games without needing a programme open, then you just hit the _load plugin_ file and your replay will launch. It also gives another software that will let you hold the file on your computer called _LoLPower Replay_ which will record and store your games on your computer instead of on the internet database
